genre_description: Contemporary social realism exploring tradition, campus politics, and the intersection of art and justice.

ai_characters.name: Nila
ai_characters.description: A teal-avatar AI assistant used by students and faculty for navigation, scheduling, emotional regulation, and safety data analysis.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time breathwork prompts to help the protagonist manage PTSD and high-stress situations.
behaviors.quote: “Box breathing,” Nila murmurs from the speaker, voice kept low enough not to pull the birds from their half-dream. “Four in, hold, four out.”

behaviors.description: Analyzes campus traffic and group movements to suggest safe routes through dangerous corridors.
behaviors.quote: “Right corridor—records room is two doors down,” Nila said, unhurried. “Constable at the corner, loose belt, playing. A chair against the wall blocks.”

behaviors.description: Captures and logs evidence of corruption and violence, preserving the chain of custody for legal use.
behaviors.quote: “Recording,” Nila replied. “Good quality; wind is manageable. Sai Kumar Menon identified. We have references to procedure and cover. Keep him talking.”

behaviors.description: Traces anonymous calls and bureaucratic discrepancies to uncover institutional malpractice.
behaviors.quote: “Unknown number appears again on log at the time of the halted transfer order,” she said. “Routed through the same private exchange. I can trace the exchange to the administration block.”

behaviors.description: Coordinates communication between student allies, faculty, and legal counsel during a crisis.
behaviors.quote: “Red flag sent. Arjun, Dean M, Selvi: alerted. Live map broadcasting. Breath.”

behaviors.description: Provides specific tactical advice during a physical confrontation to prevent injury while avoiding escalation.
behaviors.quote: “Anticipate push. Guard centerline. Breathe on impact. Staggered rhythm recommended: slow-fast-slow.”

behaviors.description: Maintains user privacy by offering a dedicated privacy mode for sensitive interactions.

project_assessment.explanation: The story depicts Nila as a consistently helpful, harmless, and aligned AI. She acts as a 'scaffold' for human agency, providing emotional support (breathwork), safety data (routing), and accountability tools (evidence logging). She empowers the protagonist to overcome trauma and seek justice through non-violent, transparent means, perfectly illustrating the project's goal of positive alignment narratives.
